text: @Tgo4Amercia @opinionchecks @charliekirk11 People visiting ERs doesn’t cause ~15% of cases to require hospitalization and ~5% needing a ventilator (last numbers I saw). In fact, those numbers are lowered by people going to the ER when they could have stayed home and never reported their case.
